name: John Mauduit
bio: After 12 years as a sound engineer, I decided to change my career and train myself to become a web developer. In view of this objective, I joined in June 2018 the Coding-Academy by Epitech. Eager to continue to evolve in competence, I am looking for a permanent contract.
text-1: Learning many computer languages. For more information I invite you to download my resume, on the contact page.
